description: This file sets up a Slack agent with user memory capabilities, configuring memory management, integrating with external tools like Google Search, and defining the Slack API application for a chatbot.

classes.name: SlackAPI
classes.description: A class representing the Slack API integration for the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing the conversational agent with memory and tools.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Method to retrieve the FastAPI app instance for deployment.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Method to run the Slack API app server.
